name: DS Dengeki Bunko: Inukami! feat. Animation
name_original: DS Dengeki Bunko: Inukami! feat. Animation
description:
DS Dengeki Bunko: Inukami! feat. Animation is an adventure game developed by Medis Media. It came out on 07-12-2006. It was published by Medis Media.
DS Dengeki Bunko: Inukami! feat. Animation is available on Nintendo DS.
